urls.title: Trump Touts Strong Jobs Report, Flubs Some Facts - FactCheck.org
urls.description: In a Rose Garden address to comment on a surprisingly strong May jobs report, President Donald Trump continued to repeat false, misleading and exaggerated claims about the economy, the administration's response to COVID-19, the border wall, veterans programs and trade with China.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@realDonaldTrump lies about everything.

 Feb 17: COVID-19 is going to disappear ... like a miracle. 

Actually 1 million cases and twice as many deaths as in Vietnam war

More lies here ...

https://t.co/nLtgIq7bdN 18:11:50
